Ndị otu Cameroon Development Cooperation (CDC), nke a na-akpọbu Commonwealth Development Cooperation, bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ebupụ mbupụ na ndị were ọrụ na Cameroon
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1947, maka ebumnuche nke ịzụlite na ịgbasa ihe ọkụkụ nke ihe ọkụkụ na-ekpo ọkụ na mba ahụ
CDC bụ ụlọ ọrụ agribusiness yana ụlọ ọrụ izugbe ya dabere na Bota, Limbe
Ihe ndị bụ isi ya gụnyere rọba, nkwụ mmanụ, unere, aki oyibo, tii, wdg.
CDC bụ onye ọrụ kachasị ukwuu na Cameroon ma nyere ndị Cameroon na mba ahụ aka n'ụzọ ọdịnala
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ọrụ mbụ na Cameroon rụrụ ọrụ n'ubi ya
Site na ụgwọ a na-enweta n'ubi ndị a, ọtụtụ nde ndị Cameroon enwetala agụmakwụkwọ banyere ụdị nrụrụ aka nke idu ndú.
CDC na-arụ ọrụ n'ìgwè, otu ọ bụla na-achịkwa ihe ọkụkụ nke ya
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Group Palms Management na-ahụ maka ịkụ osisi nkwụ, ịzụlite, owuwe ihe ubi nke mkpụrụ nkwụ na mmepụta mmanụ nkwụ maka mbupụ na oriri mpaghara.
Ndị ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ na ọkwa atọ: Ọrụ ndị okenye, ọrụ dị n'etiti na ndị ọrụ.

N'afọ 2019, n'ihi esemokwu agha na mpaghara North West na South West nke Cameroon, ọ belatara ọkara ọrụ 22,000 ya. Na ngwụcha afọ 2016, ubi ya gbatịrị ihe karịrị hekta 38,537, gụnyere hekta 20,695 na osisi rọba (Rubber), hekta 13,945 na osisi nkwụ mmanụ, hekta 3,897 na ubi unere.
